text: ogɨnap Klit nɨb, ogɨnap Alebiya nɨb agɨlak. Chɨn ogɨnap Juda yɨpɨd gɨl yɨbɨl, ogɨnap Juda mel man okok nɨb okok nɨb ownok ak pen Juda binɨb gɨpal tek ak gɨpun agɨlak. Pen takaw yɨbɨl chɨn keke mɨdeb tek ak agel chɨn mɨdupsek nɨgobun agɨlak. God kɨles tɨmel gɨl, tap teplep okok mɨdupsek gak ak agebal agɨlak.
